name: arbitrating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
arbitrate
to make a judgment in an argument, usually because asked to do so by those involved: I've been asked to arbitrate between the opposing sides. An outside adviser has been brought in to arbitrate the dispute between the management and the union. Synonym
mediate
